message: Do you know any Rails books that are being written/developed during these days/weeks/months?

This one is: http://www.manning.com/katz/ - But I believe it's mostly (all?) written by Ryan Bigg, and not wycats. Mr. Bigg updates his twitter often about his progress writing the book: http://twitter.com/#!/ryanbigg
It's pretty good! Mostly oriented toward BDD with Cucumber/Rspec. Every single step of the application that is developed in this book is detailed. Very practical book.
What kind of application do you develop in the book?
